1.00.name: wordpress/wp-email
1.00.description:
Allows people to recommend/send your WordPress blog's post/page to a friend.

Demo | Translations | Support Forums

Credits

  • Icons courtesy of FamFamFam.
  • __ngetext() by Anna Ozeritskaya.
  • Right-to-left language support by Kambiz R. Khojasteh
  • Maintenance by AaronCampbell

Donations

I spent most of my free time creating, updating, maintaining and supporting these plugins, if you really love my plugins and could spare me a couple of bucks as my school allowance, I will really appericiate i
